definitions.definition: to be conscious of what is around you by using your eyes:
examples: Turn the light on so I can see.

definitions.definition: to watch a film, television programme, etc.:
examples: Did you see that documentary on Channel 4 last night?

definitions.definition: to be the time or place when something happens:
examples: This summer has seen the end of water restrictions in the area thanks to a new reservoir.

definitions.definition: said to mean that more surprising or exciting things are likely to happen
